A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredible character development. People that don't like it are just mad that Luke isn't a hero anymore. This was a more realistic and compelling portrayal of a hero's journey. Mentorship and failure are essential components as Yoda himself says. Also\, everyone that's mad about plot holes\, there's still a whole other movie left...chill. Also\, 5 STARS FOR BEN SWOLO
